author: Sam Meredith
title: Ukraine nuclear agency reports rise in Chornobyl radiation levels after Russian troops seize control
description: An explosion and fire at the Chornobyl power plant on April 26, 1986, led to the world's worst nuclear disaster.
content:
Ukraine's nuclear agency on Friday warned radiation at the defunct Chornobyl nuclear power plant had exceeded control levels after Russian troops seized control of the area.
